title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Perform research on existing solutions, conduct user surveys and interviews to gather detailed requirements for the EnergyHarvestingWearables project. The goal is to identify user needs, functional and non-functional requirements, constraints, and potential solutions.

title: Design the Wearable Hardware
description: Develop the design for wearable devices capable of generating energy from body movements, considering materials, components, and power management.

title: Design the Energy Harvesting Electronics
description: Develop the design for energy harvesting circuits, power storage components, and power management systems.

title: Develop the Electronics Prototype
description: Build and test a working prototype of the energy harvesting wearable device.

title: Develop the Mobile App Interface
description: Create a user-friendly mobile app interface for controlling and monitoring the energy harvesting wearable device.

title: Integrate Energy Harvesting Wearable with Mobile App
description: Connect the energy harvesting wearable device with the mobile app and enable data exchange.

title: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
description: Test the energy harvesting wearable device and mobile app with users to validate its functionality, usability, and performance.
dependencies: Integrate Energy Harvesting Wearable with Mobile App

title: Deployment and Release Management
description: Plan, test, and execute the deployment of the energy harvesting wearable device and mobile app to users.

title: Documentation and User Manual
description: Write user manuals, tutorials, and other documentation to help users understand how to use the energy harvesting wearable device and mobile app.
